poemContent: In the dark, of the lair, dark and dank, dorito crisps, piss stained carpets and hollowed corpses of Something much, or something else. Suffocated by the smell, within mid flight, and illuminated by a rainbow of lights, "bruh that's ga-" Then Blasted through by dual AKs, Scopes, aimed in right at the beast, A horrific image of flesh wrapp'd bone, On the doorstep of death's door, covered in sweat and coated in grease. And as each barrel opened wide, Metal becomes light, as it reaches  speed. And punches through layer after layer of skin and bone, plastering the computer screen. This all happened, except it didn't; "Game over" engraved on the LCD, "Gamer simulator 2021 has good graphics", a human read. On his macbook, in the park "Yet here in nature I can't see this screen" Why are gamers potrayal so dark? 
